{'mobileno': '1234567890'}.response: A one-time password (OTP) has been successfully sent to the mobile number 1234567890. Please check your messages to find the OTP and proceed with the account registration process. The OTP is valid for 10 minutes and must be entered on the registration page to authenticate your mobile number. If you do not receive the OTP within a few minutes, please request for a new OTP or contact support for assistance. Ensure that your mobile phone is powered on and has sufficient signal to receive text messages. We value your security; please do not share this OTP with anyone.
